snippet: Jordan Spieth was chosen for the United States team for the Presidents Cup after a summer that included becoming the first teenager in 82 years to win a PGA Tour event.
abstract: Profile of 20-year-old Jordan Spieth, who has been chosen for the United Sates team for the Presidents Cup following heady summer in which he became first teenager in 82 years to win a PGA Tour event; Spieth's rise has attracted heavy media coverage.
lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth was chosen for the United States team for the Presidents Cup after a summer that included becoming the first teenager in 82 years to win a PGA Tour event.

headline.main: At 20 and in the Spotlight, Whether He Likes It or Not
headline.print_headline: At 20 and in the Spotlight, Whether He Likes It or Not
